body: It seems not to work properly. I.E. when generating decks from Standard the program adds cards from other cubes (legacy) and deck editor contains all of the cards (filter could be useful).
author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: Cube (card pool) selection
content:
_From [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/) on July 15, 2013 13:57:01_

It seems not to work properly. I.E. when generating decks from Standard the program adds cards from other cubes (legacy) and deck editor contains all of the cards (filter could be useful).

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=366_
